item.title: Collection of rubbish in Lesnes woods, 18th January
item.description:
Out on the monthly litter pick around Lesnes. Found a lot here and not possible to carry it all back to the Abbey so have left some off it here (see pic). Please can it be removed. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Havel Court, West Heath, Greater London

item.title: Litter everywhere, 18th January
item.description:
There is litter everywhere. I reported to TFL too but they say it is very much Hackney Council’s responsibility under Section 89(1) of the Environmental Protection Act (EPA). It’s never going to change unless one big clean happens. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lea Bridge Road, Hackney, London
